name: The Chronicles Of Myrtana: Archolos - Polish Voice-Over Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.0 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB DirectX-compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 680 / AMD R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
